item.title: Late Autumn/Mild Winter v6.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 23, 2025

Late Autumn/Mild Winter v6.1 ETS2

This is a graphics and weather mod that simulates a late Autumn or a mild winter weather/environment and transforms older parts of the map with newer high resolution graphics.

Features
Late Autumn/Mild Winter vegetation & daylight hours
Random grey sky, foggy and clear weather
Leafless vegetation
Appropriate temperature readings
Pedestrians in winter clothing
Roads, fields, grass, terrain, sidewalks, kerbs, hedges, railings, treewalls and other textures replaced with higher resolution versions
Low resolution tree models replaced by high resolution ones across maps
Improved grass
Increased grass density
Improved road textures
Improved rain

Compatibility latest version: ETS2 1.56
Works with Promods and many other maps.
Compatible with all map DLCs.

Changes in 6.1
Updated for 1.56

Recommended settings
Vegetation Detail: High
Grass Density: High

Important!!
Late Autumn/Mild Winter is a weather and graphics mod so other weather and graphics mods should be disabled to avoid conflicts, issues and crashes.
Late Autumn/Mild Winter should be given a HIGH priority in Mod Manager.

Credits: Grimes

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Multiple Trailers in Traffic v1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 23, 2025

Multiple Trailers in Traffic v1.56 ATS

Adds double/triple trailers in traffic.
Adds cargo in traffic from the Farm Machinery, Forest Harvesting, Heavy Cargo and Volvo Construction DLCs.
Adds trailers in traffic from the Forest Harvesting & Lodeking DLCs.
Adds trailers and cargo in traffic from the Oversize DLC.
Makes all trailers with visible cargo appear in traffic with the full range of available loads.
Versions of the trucks in the Truck Traffic Pack by Jazzycat mod for double/triple trailers.
Single and triple versions of the 28′ double rigs from the Painted Truck Traffic Pack by Jazzycat mod.
Single and triple versions of the 28′ double rigs from the trucks and trailers traffic project by d goldhaber mod.
Double/triple trailer availability in areas outwith the SCS map e.g. Canada & Mexico.
More double & triple trailers for cargo-hauling.
More trucks to haul the double/triple trailers in traffic.

New version available for ATS v1.56

Sound Fixes Fix now included in 7z archive
Arnook addon is back to add different cargo types to double goosenecks
More cargo for vehicle transporters

Credits: Mr Larrington

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Tandem Traffic Pack v2.3.9 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 23, 2025

Tandem Traffic Pack v2.3.9 ETS2

Mod adds to traffic tandem combos with 45 skins of real companies.
Included 25 meter Scandinavian tandem combos.
All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with other traffic packs.
For game version 1.56.x

Whats new: update for patch 1.56, some fixes

Credits: Solaris36, Fredy, TrafficManiac

item.title: Emergency Traffic Pack v1.2.14 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 23, 2025

Emergency Traffic Pack v1.2.14 ETS2

Mod adds to traffic emergency vehicles (Mercedes-Benz Vito, Fiat Ducato, Nissan Pathfinder, Skoda Octavia, Mercedes-Benz Sprinter) in 39 countries: Finland, Albania, Estonia, Russia, Slovakia, Austria, Slovenia, France, Germany, Moldova, Spain, Sweden, UK, Ukraine, Switzerland, Greece, Belgium, Bulgaria, Hungary, Iceland, Croatia, Czech Republic, Italy, Latvia, Netherlands, Norway, Denmark, Liechtenstein, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Turkey, Tunisia, Algeria, Morocco, Libya, Egypt.
All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with other traffic mods.
For game version 1.56.x
Some skins by Solaris36

Version 1.2.14 – update for patch 1.56

Credits: TrafficManiac

item.title: Sport Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.7.11 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 23, 2025

Sport Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.7.11 ETS2

Pack adds in traffic 261 sport and super cars:

9ff GT9
AC 378 GT Zagato
Alfa Romeo 4C, 8C Competizione
Alpine A110
Apollo Intensa Emozione

Ariel Atom

Audi R8(’10, ’19), TT(’04, ’09, ’16)
Bentley Continental (GT ’04, Supersport ’10, GT ’18), Bacalar Mulliner
BMW i8, Z3(E36/8), Z4(E86, E89, G29), Z8, 8(G14), M3 GTR
Bugatti Veyron, Chiron, EB110, Divo

Felino CB7

Genty Akylone
Ginetta F400
GTA Spano

HTT Plethore LC-750

Icona Vulcano

Kepler Motion
Koenigsegg One:1, CCXR, Regera, CC8S, Gemera
Lamborghini Gallardo, Diablo, Veneno, Aventador, Centenario, Murcielago, Reventon, Countach
Lexus LFA, SC430, LC 500, RC F
Lotus Exige S Roadster, Evora, Elise(’99, ’05, ’17), Exige ’06, Espirit ’02, Evija
Lucra L148
Maserati Gransport, GranTurismo, MC12, Spyder
Mazda RX-7, RX-8, MX-5(’94, ’01, ’07, ’15)
Mazzanti Evantra
Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG GT, SLK(R171, R172), SL(R230, R231), SLR McLaren Roadster, AMG GTR, CLK63 AMG, CL55 AMG, CLK GTR, 190 Evo II
McLaren 570s, P1, 720S, F1, 12C, 675LT, Senna
Mitsubishi Eclipse(’95, ’03, ’12), Lancer Evo(III, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, X), Starion, 3000GT, FTO
Morgan Aero SuperSports

Nissan GT-R, 350Z, 370Z, Z
Noble M600, M12
Onuk Sazan
Opel Speedster
Pagani Huayra, Zonda
Peugeot RCZ
Pininfarina Battista
Porsche 911(993, 996 GT2, 997, 992), 718 Boxster, Carrera GT, Cayman(981, 987), 959, 944, 918, 968
Renault Clio V6
Rezvani Beast Alpha
Rimac Concept One, C Two
Rossion Q1
Ruf CTR3, 3800S, SCR
Savage Rivale Roadyacht
Sbarro Alcador
Scuderia Cameron Glickenhaus SCG003
Spada Vetture Sport Codatronca
Spyker C8 Aileron, C12 Zagato
SSC Ultimate Aero
Subaru Impreza WRX STI(GM, GD, GH, GV), BRZ GT
Suzuki Swift Sport
Toyota GT86, Celica(’92, ’94, ’03), Supra(’92, ’98, ’19), MR2(’89, ’95, Roadster)
Tushek TS900 Apex
TVR Sagaris, Tuscan, Typhon
Ultima GTR
Vauxhall Monaro, VX220
Vencer Sarthe
W Motors Fenyr Supersport, Lykan Hypersport
Wiesmann MF3, GT MF5
Zenvo ST1

All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with AI packs by Jazzycat.
For version 1.56.x
Included two versions: for use only with default traffic and for use with Jazzycats AI pack.
You must have in mod folder two files:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_base.scs
and
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_def.scs (only with default traffic)
or
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_jaz.scs (with Jazzycats AI pack)
If you want to have many sport cars everywhere use only one file:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_base.scs

Version 12.7.11 – update for patch 1.56

Credits: TrafficManiac
